title: Couverture
alternative_title: クーベルチュール ; 型男巧克力专卖店
status: クーベルチュール ; 型男巧克力专卖店
description:
Description :
        Couverture, a specialty store run by a pair of handsome brothers dealing in fine chocolates. For the times when you are swaying in between career and love. For the times you are troubled awaiting a spring romance. For the times when you feel like you have forgotten how to smile or be gentle. If you take one step into the shop, you will understand the flavor of happiness they want to share with everyone.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 4: The Taste Of Fall
Vol.1 Chapter 3: The Taste Of Summer
Vol.1 Chapter 2: The Taste Of Spring
Vol.1 Chapter 1: The Taste Of Winter
